ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: This candidate has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 4 years. Currently this candidate is employed as an Applications Developer at United Parcel Service Inc. This candidate has extensive knowledge of Oracle, HTML, Cascading Style Sheets, Apache Subversion, jQuery, XML, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, Web Services, Microsoft SQL Server, JavaScript, Java Server Pages, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, JSON, ECLiPSe, UNIX, Siebel CRM, Quality Assurance, Oracle JDeveloper, Oracle CRM, Oracle 10G, Microsoft Visual Studio, Microsoft Visio, Linux, Java, Jakarta TOMCAT Servlet Engine, JDK, JAD, DB2, BPEL, WinCVS 1.3, PeopleSoft, Oracle EBS, JDBC, Ant. So far this candidate has not gained any managerial experience.
